com.buession.security.web.builder

接口 HttpSecurityBuilder

  • 所有已知实现类:
    ReactiveHttpSecurityBuilder, ServletHttpSecurityBuilder

    public interface HttpSecurityBuilder
    浏览器安全性构建器
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0.0
    作者:
    Yong.Teng

    • 方法概要
